name: Gbagyi Knunu
description:
The Gbagyi people, are people who dominate the FCT (Federal Capital Territory) of Nigeria, though there are Gbagyi people in other states, and other languages in FCT. Pounding is a common activity for the Gbagyi people. The pound cooked yam, and soup ingredients using a mortar and pestle.

This game uses the same machines as used in pounding with a mortar, you raise the pestle up and bring it back down. But in this game, you will use a seekbar to move the pestle up and down and not letting the pestle go over the screen else, a live will be taking each time this happens.

Level 1 has no obstacle but Level 2 to 9 has some obstacles.

So stick around
